name: Point

properties.name: x
properties.description: The horizontal coordinate, a pixel offset from the origin of the element's coordinate space.

properties.name: y
properties.description: The vertical coordinate, a pixel offset from the origin of the element's coordinate space.

description: Defines the location of a window or UI element. Contains a 2-element array.
longdesc:
Specifies the origin point of an element as horizontal and vertical pixel offsets from the origin of the element's coordinate space.
        A Point object is created when you set an element’s location property. You can set the property using a JavaScript object with properties named x and y, or an array with 2 values in the order [x, y].
